name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 30, Hengyang County, Hunan. Villagers posted a video saying that the quality of the Caiyuan Village reservoir project is worrying.
The video shows that the stones on the dam can be easily broken by hand.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Enter with caution]
On April 1, on the 22nd floor of a residential complex on Yulin Avenue in Chongqing, a woman stabbed her mother-in-law with a kitchen knife and then threw her 3-year-old son out of the window, where he fell to the ground and died.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police report said that the woman suddenly became manic at home, and her relatives and neighbors reported that her mental behavior was abnormal recently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 1, the Hangzhou Dianzi University campus network authentication interface published the Civilized Internet Access Convention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today in history, the Voice of April kicks off
On April 1, 2022, Shanghai implemented full-area static management

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As Netflix's version of "The Three-Body Problem" sparked heated discussions in the Great Firewall
On April 1, netizens discovered that the section in the film "Einstein is his mother" was completely deleted in the Great Firewall, and even the relevant screenshots were blocked.
At the same time, through searches, it was found that a large number of Netflix's "The Three-Body Problem" commentary videos on TikTok before are now all gone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Ministry of Finance recently issued a notice, making clear requirements for central departments and local finances to implement the party and government agencies' habit of living a tight life.
It emphasizes that central departments should take the lead in significantly reducing forums, festivals, exhibitions and other activities. Curbing problems such as overestimation and miscalculation of project applications and mixing irrelevant content. It is strictly forbidden to squeeze and misappropriate "three guarantees" funds, and strict supervision will be implemented on fiscal expenditures and appropriations in regions where "three guarantees" are at risk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 31, Zhengzhou, Henan
Many students of Zhengzhou University complained that the school had recently been flooded with a large number of tourists, and the campus was "three-light".
Tourists rushed into the campus and broke the wishing tree on campus, and the fish raised in the school pool were also taken away by tourists. Even the students' bicycles were ridden away by tourists.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 31, Nanjing, Jiangsu. Some netizens took photos of citizens riding electric wheelchairs on the street.
Some netizens responded, "Electric vehicles cannot be licensed, motorcycles are restricted, and cars have no place to park. Electric wheelchairs will become the only means of transportation."
Some netizens said, "If the speed limit is really 25, I will get a wheelchair to deliver food."
It is understood that the transition period for electric bicycles in Jiangsu Province will end on April 14, 2024, when vehicles that exceed the standard will face elimination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 1, a pedestrian collision occurred in Huinan Town, Pudong New District, Shanghai.
In the video, a car hit a delivery man, then knocked the delivery man onto the roof of the car and then hit a passerby at high speed.
Pudong traffic police said that they are investigating and handling the matter, and everything is subject to official response.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 31, a man posted a video saying that he and his son were rafting in the Moon Bay Scenic Area in Jing County, Xuancheng, Anhui Province, when they were suddenly attacked by several staff members with pebbles and asked to go ashore. He kept begging and said he would go ashore in a safe place, but he was still attacked.
The man said that this was a free self-driving scenic area, and the reason he was attacked might be that he did not pay to ride the kayak of the kayaking company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 28, a male corpse was found in the back seat of a car in the parking lot of Linyi University in Shandong Province. Linyi University conducted a survey of students at school one by one that morning.
According to the contributor, the deceased was a student at the School of Information and Technology.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of March 31, Nanchang was hit by strong winds, thunderstorms and heavy rainfall.
A resident of Linfengxiang Pavilion in Weimeng Qingshuiwan Community, Nanchang County, said that the strong wind blew away the windows of his living room and bedroom, and his 64-year-old mother and 11-year-old son were blown downstairs in their sleep and died unfortunately.
Another resident of the same community also said that his lover was blown downstairs and died unfortunately.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/z4Hfhk89YN

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another video circulating online shows that on the evening of March 29, a family's living room glass was suddenly blown down by strong winds.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens have reported on social media that it is difficult to apply for a passport in Qinghai Province. One netizen with a Qinghai hukou said that the hukou police station told her that she could not apply for a passport in her own name, but had to apply with a tour group, and that she had to hand in her passport within one month after returning home from her trip.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens have said on social media that they were asked to read a script at the immigration hall when leaving the country, which was suspected to be used for voiceprint comparison. The content of the script was a telecom fraud script. Although this is not an isolated case, posts mentioning this content will be deleted immediately.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A relatively basic common sense, collecting your voiceprint in the name of anti-fraud does not mean that your voiceprint will only be used for anti-fraud.
If you think it is a good thing, you can go back and record it yourself

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today is the 7th anniversary of the establishment of Xiongan New Area.
By the end of 2023, the cumulative investment in Xiongan key projects has reached 657 billion yuan.
At the same time, according to the recent reports on the official website of Xiongan, China, Xiongan has a history of more than 8,000 years, and 8 ancient civilization relics have been discovered in this area, ranging from the Neolithic Age to the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
The Millennium Plan has exceeded its mission

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @X You just made a joke, my fans got shocked

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 31, Guangdong. A group of family members who were looking for their children came to Guangdong to look for their children, and were followed for dozens of kilometers by a black car with a covered license plate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 1, in Hailun City, Heilongjiang Province, because the heating temperature provided by the heating company did not meet the standard, the owners gathered in front of the city government and held up banners to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In addition, a student from Zhengzhou University said that the third picture shows the fish being fed with water on the day, not tourists catching fish.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 1, Daqing City, Heilongjiang Province.
Urban management officers confiscated goods and electric bikes from roadside vendors, who held on to the bikes tightly and refused to let go.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 31, Zhengzhou, Henan. Zhangzhuang South Village. A cordon was set up at the scene, and a large number of police were on the scene to maintain stability.
Some people said it was demolition, while others said it was bridge repair and reconstruction.
